txt.en: 'The salamanders are breeding more and more of late, and their eggs are hatching in greater numbers. More salamanders beget yet more salamanders.\n\n'If you get a chance, burn their vile nests! But be careful -- they guard their eggs viciously.'

'That should slow the beasts down! It seemed like there was to be no end to them, and they grew bold as brass. Vicious creatures, are they not?\n\n'I am glad you came back safe, and more glad you came back victorious! You are quite brave, good [placeholder].'
Salamanders have laid eggs in nests all around the ruins of the Seething Mire.
Burned a nest, eggs and all ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Nests of the salamanders can be found in the Seething Mire.\n\nYou should burn the nests of the salamanders, destroying as many as you can.
Higbald is at the gate of Langhold.\n\nYou should return to Higbald now that you have set fire to many salamander nests, thus destroying several eggs.
